data.actual_result: The header cuts off at the end of the name
data.expected_result: The header should extend to the other end of the modal regardless of the name's length
data.short_description: Emoji category headers cut off at the name length
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a channel you can send messages in - Open the Emoji Picker and scroll down so that the name category is over some emojis
